Texts.Eng:
Evolved in the depths of a Penumbral world, the Nightar dislike light intensely. They are able warriors and capable spies.
  
 Diet: Omnivorous
  
 ^orange;Perks^reset;:
 ^green;Darkness^reset; increases ^green;Physical Resistance^reset; and ^green;Damage^reset; and enables Draining strikes.
 Tech: ^green;Conshak^reset;(creates light aura, detect monsters, reflect damage. ^red;8s charge-up^reset;)
 Resist: ^green;40^reset;% Shadow, ^green;10^reset;% Ice
 Immune: Bio-Ooze, Poison
  
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;:
 All Swords: +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;10^reset;% damage and ^green;3^reset;% Shadow Burst Chance (^green;5 damage^reset;) when fully healed. 
 Shortswords or Daggers: +^green;10^reset;% Crit Damage
 Longsword or Katana: +^green;6^reset;% Damage
 Katana/Rapier + Dagger: +^green;1.5^reset;% Crit Chance
 2x Small Blades: +^green;12^reset;% Protection, +^green;5^reset;% Movement Speed
 Shield: +^green;2 Shield Bash, +25% Knockback Resist^reset;
 Whip: +^green;10^reset;% Movement Speed
    
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
 Weak: ^red;20^reset;% Cosmic, ^red;20^reset;% Radiation, ^red;20^reset;% Electric
 ^red;Light^reset; reduces ^red;Energy, Health, Physical Resistance and Damage^reset; and cancels ^red;Drain effect^reset; of attacks.
